STATE
v.
MATTHEWS. No. COA08-475. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed January 20, 2009. Certification Date February 9, 2009. Appeal from Mecklenburg (05CRS71658, 05CRS71659, 05CRS71660, 05CRS71661, 05CRS71662, 05CRS71663, 05CRS71664, 05CRS71665, 05CRS71666, 05CRS71667, 05CRS241867, 05CRS241868).
